lines.text: My name's Denver - The Denver Kid. And driftin's my business.
You was driftin' mighty fast across that state line - faster than the border patrol. Kinda hot, ain't ya, mister?
A little warm. I heard that Cemetery Ridge was a good place to cool off.
Oh, it's a great climate - but it'll cost ya.
Cemetery Ridge was a good town. A nice little town until The Fox and his minions took over. Do you know what a minion is, Sheriff?
It means nasty crooks the likes of you being made Sheriff by The Fox rather than being duly elected by the people.
I was just tellin' the truth.
Did you have to begin on me?
If you ever got anything else to say about The Fox, Denver, do me a favor and wait until I'm not around. Boy, this isn't much of a life, but it's all I got!
Have you got everything straight? All of it?
I'll worry. You just take care of it.
